titleStmt.title: A discoverie of the beasts being an exposition of the XIII chapter of the Revelation of Jesus Christ : wherein all true Christians (yet in Babylon) are admonished to come out, and the anti-Christians fore-told what their plagues will be / by I.W.
titleStmt.author: I. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Imperfect: some text dark and partially illegible.
